messages.title: Fighting for Democracy, Fighting for Ogmore
messages.content: I am proud to be the Ogmore Constituency Candidate. I have been selected to stand as the parliamentary candidate for The Brexit Party and represent communities. I am committed to helping people, providing services, and working tirelessly for the benefit of the Ogmore constituency.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that the budget allocation for strategic projects is made available for the Ogmore Constituency, using the savings from not paying into the EU.
Work closely with the Welsh Assembly and Local Government to deliver first-class services for all the people of Ogmore and Wales.
Review and reform law and order, including a review of sentencing guidelines and an increase in front line policing.
We are the only political party in Wales committed to respecting the result of the 2016 EU Referendum. The Welsh vote to leave will not be ignored or betrayed. Let's make a success out of Brexit!

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want more of the same that we've had for the last 20 years, then vote Labour.

issues.brexitEurope: Let's make a success out of Brexit!
issues.lawCrime: Review and reform law and order, including a review of sentencing guidelines and an increase in front line policing.

community.content: Ensure that the budget allocation for strategic projects is made available for the Ogmore Constituency, using the savings from not paying into the EU.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am not a career politician! I started out helping to run the family business, and for the last 5 years, I have worked in the Welsh National Health Service, providing services and support for people with long-term health conditions. I have served as an energetic Community Councillor, Chair of School Governors and led a local charity for Children with Special Needs and Autism.

politicalExperience.role: Community Councillor, Chair of School Governors, Charity Leader
politicalExperience.achievements: Served as an energetic Community Councillor, led a local charity for Children with Special Needs and Autism.

If you want more of the same that we've had for the last 20 years, then vote Labour.
Ensure that the budget allocation for strategic projects is made available for the Ogmore Constituency, using the savings from not paying into the EU.
Work closely with the Welsh Assembly and Local Government to deliver first-class services for all the people of Ogmore and Wales.
Let's make a success out of Brexit!

examples: If you want more of the same that we've had for the last 20 years, then vote Labour.
